ref: 8535 prátapati ʻ kindles ʼ RV., ʻ warms ʼ ŚBr., ʻ roasts ʼ R. [√tap]
Pk. opt. paavejja ʻ may he warm ʼ, pp. payavia -- , pass. pres. part. paavijjaṁta -- ;
Or. poĩbā ʻ to warm oneself ʼ, poibā, puibā ʻ to fry cakes in ghee ʼ;
H. ponā ʻ to heat (an oven), bake bread ʼ;
M. povṇẽ ʻ to soften (plaintain leaves &c.) by exposure to fire or sun or steam ʼ.
